trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Folsom
There were no other sightings in Folsom on or around July 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI described what appeared to be a UFO to a friend when He shared that another friend of his also saw a UFO with flashing lights flying westward and about the same time of the evening that I saw it. When I witnessed the UFO it was howering above in a southwest direction and was quite high up in the sky unlike the previous orbs I saw in December 2011. A neighbor came outside with her two dogs that were barking incessantly so I took my dogs inside to avoid them. When I returned a minute later I no longer saw the UFO.
Summary: It had flashing lights and at first I thought it may be an airplane but when I watched for several minutes I realized it was not an airplane.
